Learn from the experts

Our business consultants combine years of owning, operating, and managing successful firms with their knowledge of trends to deliver a unique learning experience you won’t find anywhere else. Our courses are designed to help you and your staff grow, learn, and take your business to the next level.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Main Content – with Photo” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Simple Text Blocks” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ text_line_height=”2.1em” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Course Options

Leadership & Management

Our unique classroom curriculum paired with individual coaching is designed to maximize your leadership qualities and management skills so you can immediately take action, and implement your new knowledge to improve your funeral or cemetery business. This course includes a 3-day on-site boardroom experience at JCG’s Scottsdale headquarters followed by four monthly virtual one-on-one coaching sessions with a JCG Senior Business Consultant.

 

Customer Experience Program

This course takes a journey with your firm through a 90-day process to create a world class customer experience for your families and employees. This journey begins by creating a clear customer service vision that your entire staff can abide by, and culminates in transforming the customer experience at your business into something that will leave your families talking about the impression your firm had on them for years to come.
